## VerticalConfig.getViewAllUrl property

A function to provide user defined url path for each vertical's view all link.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getViewAllUrl?: (data: VerticalLink) => string;
```

## Remarks

Defaults to "/\[verticalKey\]?query=\[query\]"
